page.title: 18FROSTS GARDEN CENTRE
page.content: FROST'S GARDEN CENTRE AND H.C.F. LANDSCAPES. {====================================== The Frost family have developed a {10} acre site on {The Fosse Way}to include a successful garden centre and landscape contract business.The garden centre sells plants and gardening aids. Situated at the rear of the garden centre,{H.C.F. Landscapes specialize in the design and creation of gardens. This year{6}public barbecues have been held to promote business.Various garden layouts,{4 swimming pools and patio furniture are on display.Sheds, paving,gravel and turf are sold.There is a turf farm at the back, where a digger and several large industrial lawn mowers help to produce high quality turf.Mr.Hugh Frost has been managing director for{7 years.He employs{50}people.
